findings.title: Unchecked return value of ERC20 functions.
findings.description: In LPStaking smart contract there are multiple instances where the return value of transfer() and transferFrom() functions of ERC20 tokens is not checked.

findings.title: Precision loss errors.
findings.description: The getRewardPerBlock() function of LPStaking smart contract performs a division before multiplication which may result in minute precision loss.

findings.title: Functions should be declared as _external
findings.description: Some functions are declared as public but are never accessed from within the contract and are only meant to be called externally. These functions should be declared as external which is more gas optimal.

findings.title: Misleading comments
findings.description: The developer's comment above unstakeLP() function is misleading as it mentions a 5% unstaking fee from the staked amount of users which is not implemented as well as the intended business logic.

findings.title: No SPDX License identifier for Ownable.sol.
findings.description: The Solidity documentation suggests adding a machine-readable SPDX license identifier at the start of every source file, but it is missing in Ownable.sol.
